title: Frosted Italian Cookies
ingredients: ['115g unsalted butter, softened', '200g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '225g ricotta cheese', '250g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '30g unsalted butter, softened', '240g icing sugar', '1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 1/2 tablespoons milk']
